extends ChessPiece

    Michael Allen, Ziad Bekhiet

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public boolean move(Board chessboard,
                    int destRow,
                    int destCol)
        The move method attempts to move the piece to a new location, based on the specific piece movement behaviors.
        Specified by:
        move in class ChessPiece
        Parameters:
        chessboard - an instance of the chessboard at the given time of the move
        destRow - the row number of the destination space
        destCol - the column number of the destination space
        Returns:
        true if the move is possible, false if the move is not possible
